name: abcd
description: Accessible WordPress theme utilizing flex layouts and modern development practices.
author: Mimi Maldonado

howToInstallNode-SassWithoutError.step1: Uninstall ALL the python installation from Windows. (For node-sass, only Python v2.7 will work.) And also, remove ANY PATHS associated with Python that are set currently
howToInstallNode-SassWithoutError.step2: Delete .windows-build-tools dir from both `C:\Users\'your name'\.windows-build-tools` and `C:\Users\'your name'\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\.windows-build-tools` if it has been there already
howToInstallNode-SassWithoutError.step4: Open up PowerShell as Administrator and run `npm install -g node-gyp`.
howToInstallNode-SassWithoutError.step5: Next, Run `npm install --global --production windows-build-tools`. This will install all the necessary bundles including Python 2.7 in C:/Users/your-name/.window-build-tools
howToInstallNode-SassWithoutError.step6: Next, make sure to set the PYTHONPATH variable to correct path as [`C:\Users\lamus\.windows-build-tools\python27\Lib`, `C:\Users\lamus\.windows-build-tools\python27\DLLs`, `C:\Users\lamus\.windows-build-tools\python27\Lib\lib-tk`]]
howToInstallNode-SassWithoutError.step7: Also make sure that `C:\Users\lamus\.windows-build-tools\python27\` has been added to Path variable
howToInstallNode-SassWithoutError.step8: Next, Run `npm config set python 'C:\Users\lamus\.windows-build-tools\python27\python.exe'`. Do not forget to add `python.exe` at the end if you are copy/pasting. This will setup all the Python dependencies and path and executable ready correctly.
howToInstallNode-SassWithoutError.step9: Next, you have to download `win32-x64-48_binding.node` file from `https://github.com/sass/node-sass-binaries/blob/master/win32-x64-48_binding.node`, store it into one place and set the SASS_BINARY_SITE PATH variable with the location you placed the .node executable like C:\Users\lamus\safe_node_module\win32-x64-64_binding.node`
howToInstallNode-SassWithoutError.step10: Next, in the PowerShell, get to the dir you need to install node-sass, and run `rm -rf node_modules` to delete/clean-up the dir first
howToInstallNode-SassWithoutError.step11: Finally run `npm i node-sass`. This time, everything should worked out fine! DONE!
